parameters: Strangely, I don't feel like leaving the room...

Please stop making jokes that aren't funny.
Oh, maybe you worked too hard last night and didn't get
Well, I've come to like that part too...♥
Well, that's enough for me to fall asleep, and then
...If you want to do it, I'll deal with you properly ♥
There's nothing I can do about it, baby♥
I really like you, so please wait a moment.

parameters.name: 魔王魂  アコースティック44

parameters: If there's anything I can do to help, please let me
Isn't it okay to have another child soon?
It's nice that you take good care of me, though.
Please take care of her sister as well.
Yeah? Speaking of younger sisters, you're definitely
So, when did you get back?
Have you forgotten about the wife you just married?
You loved me so fiercely even yesterday...♥
I wonder if work is already over for today?
I have the day off today too, so if you don't mind,
I'd be happy if you could hear from me ♥
Hehe, I was wondering if you would hear from me soon ♥
